data.name: Don't Starve Together: Snowfallen Survivors Chest, Part II
data.detailed_description:
Snowfallen Survivors Chest, Part II

With a frosty chill setting in over the Constant, many of our Survivors have chosen to embrace the cold. Embody the spirit of winter with all the icy niceties and frozen flair befitting a seasoned seasonal celebrator.

Happy Winter's Feast!

Includes
  • Walter's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Warly's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Wortox's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • WX-78's Snowfallen Skin Set
  • Winona's Snowfallen Skin Set

data.short_description: This Snowfallen Chest contains skins for: Walter, Warly, Wortox, WX-78, and Winona.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
